availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer. Warren County native. Son of Jesse R. Kirby and Prudence Dishman Kirby. Farmer in Warren County in 1864.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, Entry for Gallatin Albert Kirby (1832-1911), Memorial #49062539, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=49062539&ref=acom (accessed May 1, 2017). National Archives and Records Administration (NARA); Washington, D.C.; Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865); Record Group: 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War); Collection Name: Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records); NAI: 4213514; Archive Volume Number: 3, Warren County, Kentucky, p. 195.
